en_text: In a hospital ward made of bricks, I found it hard to sing
jp_text: 煉瓦の病棟で
google_translated: In brick ward

en_text: Red moon, come out on this foggy night
jp_text: 霧に煙る夜
google_translated: Smoking night

en_text: I was born behind black iron bars
jp_text: 黒い鉄格子の中で
google_translated: In a black iron grite

en_text: Wish for payback for the evil done
jp_text: 悪意の代償を願え
google_translated: Hope for the massiveness of evil

en_text: As you wish, I'll give you your justice
jp_text: 望むがままにお前に
google_translated: Learn if you want

en_text: Pay karma's price and have your revenge,
jp_text: 因果の代償を払い
google_translated: Pay the cost of the causal

en_text: Monster without even a name
jp_text: 報いよ名もな怪物
google_translated: Let's reward the name and monster

en_text: Make the sky pour down black rain
jp_text: 黒い雨　降らせこの空

en_text: Now exhibit your justice

en_text: Treasuring those permanent scars
